text: Amazonepeira is a genus of South American orb-weaver spiders first described by Herbert Walter Levi in 1989. ==Species== it contains five species: *Amazonepeira beno Levi, 1994 – Ecuador, Brazil, Suriname *Amazonepeira callaria (Levi, 1991) – Peru, Bolivia, Brazil *Amazonepeira herrera Levi, 1989 – Peru, Brazil *Amazonepeira manaus Levi, 1994 – Brazil *Amazonepeira masaka Levi, 1994 – Ecuador, Brazil. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South America
title: Amazonepeira
